gatekeeper.title: Welcome to Smart Onboarding
gatekeeper.subtitle: Select your bank and preferred language to begin
gatekeeper.voicePrompt: Welcome! Say the name of your bank to select it, or say 'begin' to start.
gatekeeper.voiceSelected: Great choice! Say 'begin' when you are ready to start onboarding.

onboarding.title: Voice Onboarding
onboarding.subtitle: Tap the orb and speak naturally

aiPrompts.name: Please tell me your full name
aiPrompts.dob: What is your date of birth?

review.title: Review Your Details
review.subtitle: Tap any field to edit manually
review.voicePrompt: Please review your details. Say 'proceed' to continue to KYC, or say 'back' to go back.

kyc.title: Document KYC Verification
kyc.subtitle: Verify your identity with your camera

steps.documentDesc: Place your PAN card or Aadhaar in the frame and capture a clear photo
steps.ocrDesc: Extracting and validating information from your document
steps.selfieDesc: Switch to front camera and take a clear selfie for face verification

qualityIssue.blur: Image is too blurry. Please retake with a steady hand.
qualityIssue.dark: Image is too dark. Move to a well-lit area.
qualityIssue.bright: Image is too bright. Avoid direct light on the document.

kyc.docNotDetected: Could not identify document type. Please try again with a clearer image.
kyc.matchSuccess: Document details match your onboarding data!
kyc.matchPartial: Partial match found. Please verify the details.
kyc.noMatch: Document does not match onboarding data. Please try with the correct document.
kyc.faceNotDetected: No face detected. Please position your face clearly in the frame.
kyc.faceSkipped: Face detection not supported on this browser. Proceeding.
kyc.approvedMsg: Your identity has been verified successfully. Your onboarding is complete.
kyc.rejectedMsg: We could not verify your identity. Please try again.

voicePrompts.start: Say 'start' to begin your KYC verification.
voicePrompts.document: Point your camera at your ID document and say 'capture' to take a photo.
voicePrompts.ocr: Your document is being processed. Say 'next' to continue or 'retake' to try again.
voicePrompts.selfie: Position your face in the frame and say 'capture' to take a selfie.
voicePrompts.result: Your verification is complete. Say 'done' to finish.
